name: Optional
body:
### Welcome to Optional.
This project is a simple back-port of `java.util.Optional` from Java 8 to Java 7.

It consists of a stripped-down version of `java.util.Optional` (© Oracle), removing all the λ expression related methods. It also has a complete unit test provided, written by me.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
